circumstances: While in cruising altitude, the pilot encountered problems with the left propeller and lost control of the airplane that dove into the ground and crashed in Roosevelt. The aircraft was destroyed and both occupants were killed.
probable_cause:
Powerplant failure caused by a propeller and accessories (governors) technical issue. The following factors were reported:
- Governors disconnected, 
- Failed to maintain flying speed, 
- Improper operation of flight controls, 
- Physical impairment, 
- Suspected mechanical discrepancy, 
- Left governors lower spring seat/thrust bearing of pilot valve plunger loose, 
- Possibility of hypoglycemic reaction.
